website_summaries.verdict: For kids who enjoy soft toys and the animated Trolls movie, this is a must-have. It looks and sounds like Poppy, one of the film's beloved stars.
pros: Sports Poppy's wild hair and bright pink colors in a plushy doll that makes cute noises and speaks phrases from the movie
cons: Rare incidences of the sound malfunctioning
Some consumers received the wrong Troll that was much smaller than advertised

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a joke. Looks nothing like the photo. I had to send it back. Did provide a good laugh though hahaha
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Trolls, and she has other talking dolls from other movies (that she loves!) as well so I thought it would be perfect. However, this doll only talks, it doesn't sing. I wish it had a few of the songs from the movie, as that is my daughters favorite. Still a cute product though and comes with a little comb you can brush her hair. Our favorite phrase is "hug time"
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to what was pictured. Mine came with orange hair. Sent back
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Poppy doll is adorable
customer_reviews.text: My little one is obsessed with Poppy! This is a must have for all Troll fans. She says different phrases and comes with a cute troll shaped comb. The doll doesn't shed the hair , like I initially thought.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this thing! It was a small stocking stuffer but it turned out to be one of her all time favorite toys and goes everywhere with her!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little girl is so in love with this cute doll. Perfect size and sounds clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Small but cute. It was a gift and the child played with it right away, she really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast quality was good, I just thought it would of been a little bit bigger but my daughter loved it, it talks says phrases from the movie and she just adores poppy so of was a perfect purchase for her
customer_reviews.author: Trish trish

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Really adorable. My kids keep on stealing it from one another because they love Poppy so much. I’m not loving the seam that closes with Velcro on the back of her head, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.

customer_reviews.title: Trolls
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like in the picture. The hair is perfect for little hands to comb.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I earned best aunt after this buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece is absolutely obsessed with this doll if you have a poppy lover in your life totally worth it!

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old daughter absolutely LOVES this doll. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter absolutely LOVES this doll. It is small enough for her to carry around. She has been sleeping with it since we received it.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves trolls and this doll is adorable. Her little face lights up every time Poppy ...

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: kids loved it, don't know where it is though. somewhere in the toy room
customer_reviews.author: Juan Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old niece for Christmas and she loved it! It came the day before Christmas Eve which was awesome since it said it was expected a week after Christmas Day!! The only thing that I didn't really like about it was that it is listed as a plush, and it was pretty heavy and hard for a plush. Other than that it was the perfect gift for a Trolls lover!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Trolls DreamWorks Poppy Talkin Plush Doll
product_meta.description: Experience the DreamWorks Trolls in a totally new way -- in a soft and cuddly, talking plush form! Let DreamWorks Trolls Poppy lift everyone around her up with her positivity! Her squishy doll body talks and features cool sound effects straight from the movie. The Poppy Talkin' Troll doll stands at 14 inches tall and includes lots of colorful, plush hair and a comb you can use to create trollicious styles! Collect all characters from the movie (sold separately). DreamWorks Trolls copyright 2015 DreamWorks Animation LLC. All rights reserved. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Doll talks and makes cool sound effects
Comb included for wild hair styling
Inspired by the DreamWorks Trolls movie
Includes plush figure and a comb

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars348 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
